channel.title: Rstats Tidyverse on Ken's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rstats Tidyverse on Ken's Blog

item.title: On crossing the rubicon, or how never to use expand.grid again
item.description: Packages The usual: library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.2.1 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 2.2.1.9000 ✔ purrr 0.2.4 ## ✔ tibble 1.4.2 ✔ dplyr 0.7.4 ## ✔ tidyr 0.7.2 ✔ stringr 1.2.0 ## ✔ readr 1.1.1 ✔ forcats 0.2.0 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() Introduction Let’s use some data on Australian elite athletes, which can be found here:
